scripts.reopen:ios: yarn run close:ios ; yarn run open:ios
scripts.build:update-version: PACKAGE_VERSION=$(cat package.json | grep version | head -1 | awk -F: '{ print $2 }' | sed 's/[",]//g' | sed 's/-.*//') && cd ios && agvtool new-marketing-version $PACKAGE_VERSION && xcrun agvtool next-version -all
scripts.build:ios-new: cd ios && xcodebuild -workspace IosUtilitiesExample.xcworkspace -scheme IosUtilitiesExample -configuration Debug -sdk iphonesimulator CC=clang CPLUSPLUS=clang++ LD=clang LDPLUSPLUS=clang++ GCC_OPTIMIZATION_LEVEL=0 GCC_PRECOMPILE_PREFIX_HEADER=YES ASSETCATALOG_COMPILER_OPTIMIZATION=time DEBUG_INFORMATION_FORMAT=dwarf COMPILER_INDEX_STORE_ENABLE=NO
scripts.build-and-run: yarn run build && yarn run run:debug && yarn run run:release
scripts.pod-install:new-static: cd ios && bundle install && RCT_NEW_ARCH_ENABLED=1 USE_FRAMEWORKS='static' bundle exec pod install && yarn run build:update-version && yarn run pod-install:set-env
scripts.pod-install:new-dynamic: cd ios && bundle install && RCT_NEW_ARCH_ENABLED=1 USE_FRAMEWORKS='dynamic' bundle exec pod install && yarn run build:update-version && yarn run pod-install:set-env
scripts.pod-install:old-static: cd ios && RCT_NEW_ARCH_ENABLED=0 USE_FRAMEWORKS='static' pod install && yarn run build:update-version && yarn run pod-install:set-env
scripts.pod-install:old-dynamic: cd ios && RCT_NEW_ARCH_ENABLED=0 USE_FRAMEWORKS='dynamic' pod install && yarn run build:update-version && yarn run pod-install:set-env
scripts.pod-install:reopen: yarn run close:ios && yarn run pod-install && yarn run open:ios
scripts.pod-install:reopen-old: yarn run close:ios && yarn run pod-install:old && yarn run open:ios
scripts.nuke:example-pods: cd ios && pod cache clean --all && rm -rfv ./Pods ./build ./Podfile.lock
scripts.nuke:cache-js: watchman watch-del-all && rm -rfv $TMPDIR/react-* && rm -rfv $TMPDIR/react-native-packager-cache-* && rm -rfv $TMPDIR/metro-bundler-cache-* && rm -rfv $TMPDIR/haste-map-* &&  rm -rfv rm -rf $TMPDIR/metro-cache && npm cache clean --force && npm cache verify && yarn cache clean && rm -rfv ~/.yarn/berry/cache
scripts.nuke:all: yarn run nuke:example-pods && yarn run nuke:cache-js && yarn run nuke:derived-data && npm run nuke:node-modules
scripts.update-dep:pods: cd ios && bundle exec pod install --repo-update && bundle exec pod update DGSwiftUtilities ComputableLayout && yarn run build:update-version
